ruland.title: Lexicon Alchemiae
ruland.author: Martin Ruland the Younger
ruland.description: A comprehensive alchemical dictionary with scholarly notes and hierarchical lists.

sommerhoff.title: Lexicon pharmaceutico-chymicum Latino-Germanicum et Germanico-Latinum
sommerhoff.author: Johann Christoph Sommerhoff
sommerhoff.description: A bilingual dictionary covering pharmaceutical, alchemical, and botanical terms with extensive symbol usage.
